titleStmt.title: The original and growth of the Spanish monarchy united with the House of Austria extracted from those chronicles, annals, registers, and genealogies that yeild [sic] any faithful representation how the houses of Castile, Aragon and Burgundy became knit and combin'd by Thomas Philipot ...
titleStmt.author: Philipot, Thomas, d. 1682.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W.G. for R. Taylor ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
